Class RobotDashboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmerobotics.dashboard.RobotDashboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpModeManagerNotifier.Notifications

    public class RobotDashboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpModeManagerNotifier.Notifications
    Main class for interacting with the dashboard.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start()
        Starts the dashboard and a WebSocket server that listens for external connections. This method should usually be called from Activity.onCreate(Bundle).

      • attachEventLoop

        public static void attachEventLoop(com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.EventLoop eventLoop)
        Attaches the event loop to the dashboard for op mode management.
        Parameters:
        eventLoop -

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Stops the dashboard and the underlying WebSocket server. This method should usually be called from Activity.onDestroy().

      • getInstance

        public static RobotDashboard getInstance()
        Returns the active dashboard instance. This should be called after start().
        Returns:
        active dashboard instance or null outside of its lifecycle

      • sendTelemetryPacket

        public void sendTelemetryPacket(TelemetryPacket telemetryPacket)
        Sends telemetry information to all dashboard clients.
        Parameters:
        telemetryPacket - packet to send

      • updateConfig

        public void updateConfig()
        Sends updated configuration data to all dashboard clients.

      • getTelemetry

        public org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.Telemetry getTelemetry()
        Returns a telemetry object that proxies sendTelemetryPacket(TelemetryPacket).
